website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight but strong 9-foot leash for longboards or stand-up paddleboards.
cons: Some experienced surfers wouldn't use for big wave surf because it's too lightweight

customer_reviews.title: Great lighter weight longboard leash
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I was looking for a lighter weight less bulky leash for small days (in crowds when I need a leash). So far so good with this one. It feels much lighter than most longboard leashes I have had. Would it be my go to leash on a huge day- well it wouldn't matter because I would be on my shortboard. So I would say if you are looking for a bit lighter LB leash (I have yet to find a comp leash) this one seems to be a bit less bulky than most.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very bulky, slides off woman's arm. Extremely durable, strong, well constructed.
customer_reviews.text: I would have probably returned this if I'd tested it more. Extremely durable and strong and well constructed. However, I think it's way too bulky for a woman (5'4", 115 lbs, always sliding off my arm). The joint where the cuff connects with the leash is also very large and stiff, so, since this is on your forearm, it is always getting in the way.
customer_reviews.author: WhenInRome

customer_reviews.title: leash was good, shipping was bad
customer_reviews.text: just got it in the mail today. everything is good about the leash except for the shipping. the first time i ordered it, all i got was an empty box. i’m not sure if this was the fault of amazon or of santa barbara surfing but either way it was annoying. i got it sent again for free and got the leash that time.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Van Buren

customer_reviews.title: Great surfing leash for my SUP
customer_reviews.text: I have a surfing SUP designed for that very purpose. The leash that came with the board sprung and would come back and knock your lights out. This is a great replacement for that! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: IDK about it yet. I'll rereview after the coronavirus scare.
customer_reviews.text: I received this leash just before the voluntary coronavirus self isolation lock down. Its hanging next to the board I intend to use it on. It looks good. I can't wait to test it.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Blabs a Lot

customer_reviews.title: Attatch it, strap it, and bash it !
customer_reviews.text: Got the leash and immediately strapped it onto my board, then my ankle. Proceeded to get waves at Campus Point, Malibu and Rincon. Felt good to "represent " a great SB product. Your loyal rider.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Broke off board twice in 45 min
customer_reviews.text: The second time I used the leash the velcro opened up twice (leash to board connection not the velcro by my ankle) in a span 45 min. My board ended up hitting a little kid as it rolled to the shore. The parent of the kid was very upset and I was equally upset.
customer_reviews.author: Solange

customer_reviews.title: Great leash
customer_reviews.text: This leash has lasted for more than a year, surfing with my 8.4ft 2-3 times a week. I even used it on 6' days and suffered some few wipeouts and it remains solid, though the leash was almost new in those 6 ft days. While I won't recommend it on big days, it's a great value leash with premium quality. With care and NOT ditching your longboard, this leash could last more than a year surfing daily, even on 6ft days.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael

customer_reviews.title: Looks really good
customer_reviews.text: Great product, price, and follow through. It's new but looks as good as my Dakine, Dorsal, and others at a great price. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Bill S

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Have only used it a couple of times so far but it is comfortable with no issues. Double swivel leash at this price is great value.
customer_reviews.author: Coach5123

customer_reviews.title: Seemed great, until it split/ broke..
customer_reviews.text: My 10’ leash, used for my SUP has a split in it, more than half of the thickness. I use it in the surf. How do I get a replacement under the one year warranty, as this occurred 5 weeks after the purchase??
customer_reviews.author: Your Pharmacist

customer_reviews.title: Good leash for a good price
customer_reviews.text: The light brown/clear color of the leash matches the white gloss coat on my Phil Edwards triple stringer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for pool swimming!
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my pool so I can swim continuously without turning every 10 strokes. I attached it to the ladder. Love it!

customer_reviews.title: Great Surfboard Leash

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected for a surf least ;-) Hasn't broken yet! Use it for my giant log of a longboard.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Standup paddles
customer_reviews.text: It is just what i needed for my paddle boar

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable leash.
customer_reviews.text: Nice leash on my 8'4" board. Very comfortable and appears it will be durable. Haven't surfed in years and was out in surf little big for me and the leash survived many wipe outs.

customer_reviews.title: Works great, same quality as anything you'll find from the ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great, same quality as anything you'll find from the other major surfing brands, but this leash is half or less than half the price. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Ursula Turk

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable, forgot it was even attached. High quality and excellent price. Wish it was available in brighter colors but I love it!

customer_reviews.title: good leash
customer_reviews.text: 1/2 the price of the local surf shop. great for a long board and is holding up well

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I used mine today on my new paddle board. In fact I used it 3 times! It worked great and was super comfortable!

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort and fit
customer_reviews.text: Great leash. I’ve had other brands before that just didn’t compare to my new SBS leash.

customer_reviews.title: Durable leash
customer_reviews.text: Well made leash. Doesn’t tangle as much as my previous leash. The plastic took a long time to break into
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Looks different but works good
customer_reviews.text: The cord doesn't look like what shows in the product photo which has a funky bronze color but a more neutral grey translucent shade instead that I actually like better. The rest is as advertised good quality SS swivels have only used once yet looks durable enough. Lastly it comes in just a plastic bag no packaging at all unlike pictures on the website so not as good as a gift but no issue for an end user.
customer_reviews.author: Andy~

customer_reviews.title: Three Thumbs Up...
customer_reviews.text: Only used twice but leash has held up well (so far) and fits comfortably on ankle. Excellent value if it'll hold up over time. Three Thumbs Up 👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: JD Motes

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great value!
customer_reviews.text: Solid product, seems very durable and is comfortable on ankle or calf (fits both large and small people fine). Very good value; would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: doctur44

customer_reviews.title: Knots, twists, junk
customer_reviews.text: If u want a fight, buy this leash. Twists and knots! And when u think u won, when u stand up on the surfboard, it will get revenge and get right under your foot so u wipe out. Bad bad bad. I rather go without this knotting trash and lose my surfboard to the waves. Anti knot feature does not work.
customer_reviews.author: hotcutie

customer_reviews.title: Premium leash at an economical price
customer_reviews.text: This is a premium quality leash with strong velcro that seems like it will stand the test of time. Most of my leashes end up getting retired because the velcro weakens. It will be interesting to see how long this leash will last me. I like the transparent smoke color of the cord and the double swivel construction. Most leashes with these features cost much more. If they make this in a knee leash style I'd love to add that to my quiver too.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua W.

customer_reviews.title: SBS 9' leash...get it. 👍🏽
customer_reviews.text: SBS 9' ankle surfboad leash...get it!! ..i surf logs, gliders..usually don't use leash unless surfing in crowds. when i do use um they feel awkward for me..(not used to um)...but this leash felt like wearing no leash!! ..this one seems thin, very light and flexible.. comfort AAA. soft ankle cuff. ...didnt use it in big knarly surf so no comment on it's strength but for regular days its perfect. tanks SBS!! good deal👍🏽🙏🏾🤸🏽‍♂️
customer_reviews.author: Kawik

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, versatile and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight and easy to use leash for my SUP. Came with everything needed to attach to my SUP and use it right away. The ankle strap is very comfortable, easy to get on and off, and the swivels on both ends of the leash add convenience and versatility. I have several SBS accessories and I am again very pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect leash!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect leash! The double swivel means you can surf without worrying about constantly untangling your leash from around your leg or board. You'll never get tripped up while taking off on a wave. The thickness of the cord is ideal and flys through the water. The strap has really comfortable padding at the ankle and attached securely and strongly at the board with easy to use Velcro. It shipped super fast. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: The Sourdough Podcast

customer_reviews.title: Nice leash for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: First impressions were that it's a well made product. Quality swivels on both ends were very smooth. The cuff was a bit narrower than my previous leash and I thought that might be an issue but it was very comfortable. I've only used it once so far so I will update this review if my opinion changes after some use.
customer_reviews.author: DIANA L. CHARRON

customer_reviews.title: Great Summer Leash
customer_reviews.text: This is a great summer surf leash for the price. All the materials appear to be of very good quality and durability, but the width of the ankle band, and gauge of the rope are not as big as I am used to. I tend to by the beefiest leash available, especially for the fall, winter, and spring surf. Using it every surf session this summer to see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Di Fortini

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got it.
customer_reviews.text: Great leash with good components. Strong, but not too bulky.
customer_reviews.author: CaP

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, Perfect for my 8ft surfboard.
customer_reviews.text: Great leash at a more than reasonable price compared to other name brands that I have used. Has it all, good quality, looks good and most of all functions the way a leash should. I did get this at a promo price but would gladly pay the full price in compared to others....check one out.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great leash, easy purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is a great comfortable longboard leash. The cuff is nice and compact and the cord does not drag too much in the water.
customer_reviews.author: JMK

customer_reviews.title: High quality and good looking leash
customer_reviews.text: This is a well built leash with quality swivels and solid construction. Using it with a shortboard wave SUP.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

product_meta.title: Santa Barbara Surfing SBS 9ft Surf Leash for Longboard & Paddleboard
product_meta.description: Our 9' leash will keep you comfortable all day long, weather if it be trimming down the line at Rincon, noseriding at Malibu, or just learning to surf Old Mans. Built to last with a strong yet lightweight cord, friction free swivels, super plush and comfy ankle strap, and premium velcro.
feature_bullets: SURF or SUP: 9ft Straight Leash is versatile for surfing your longboard, and can be used as a lightweight leash for paddling your SUP.
BUILT TO LAST: Features super strong yet lightweight cord, friction free swivels, super plush and comfy ankle strap, and premium velcro.
STACKED WITH FEATURES: Never get tangled with our super silky molded-in stainless steel swivels, Easy pull tab at ankle cuff, Double tab at leash loop, Included leash loop, key pocket.
ULTRA PLUSH ANKLE CUFF: We stitch extra padding in our double velcro ankle cuff which make it super comfy. The extra material helps distribute the load meaning more painful leash pulls.
ONE YEAR GUARANTEE: You break it, we send you a new one and put you on our wall of fame.
